name: object_detection
template: v4l2src device="{source[path]}" ! concat name=c ! decodebin ! video/x-raw ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! gvadetect inference-id=inf0 model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvaidentify tracker=true ! gvametaconvert converter=json method=detection source="{source[path]}" name="jsonmetaconvert" include-no-detections=true ! gvametapublish method=file filepath="/results/results.txt" ! queue ! appsink name=appsink
